sentences.english: The blast furnace slag is grinded to have the granularity the same as that of the cement.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣粉需要磨細，粒度與水泥粒度相同。

sentences.english: Ground granulate blast furnace slag (GGBFS) is a by-product of the iron and steel manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣是中國鋼鐵業大量排放的一種冶金廢渣。

sentences.english: Studying the feasibility of using graphite scoria as filling material of expressway.
sentences.chinese: 探討採用石墨礦渣作爲高速公路填築材料的可行性。

sentences.english: This paper states the performances, investigation and utilization of GGBFS.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣的利用和研究具有巨大經濟效益和社會效益。

sentences.english: Also, the action of fly ash was compared with that of ground slag.
sentences.chinese: 此外，還對粉煤灰與磨細礦渣的作用作了比較。

sentences.english: Does the company utilize any by-products such as Fly Ash or Blast Furnace Slag?
sentences.chinese: 企業是否利用任何副產品例如粉煤灰或高爐礦渣？

sentences.english: It focuses on the activity evaluation and the analysis of activity source of ferromanganese slag.
sentences.chinese: 集中研究了錳鐵礦渣的活性評價及其活性來源。

sentences.english: Slag is lighter than iron and will float allowing it to be skimmed.
sentences.chinese: 礦渣比鐵輕，會漂浮在表面，便於撇去。

sentences.english: Chrome azurol S coloured system is used to determine Al(III) in the silicon-aluminum residue.
sentences.chinese: 以鉻天青s顯色體系測定了硅鋁礦渣中的鋁。

sentences.english: And the cement strength for ball mill slag was little better than LM .
sentences.chinese: 球磨礦渣水泥的強度比立磨的稍好。

sentences.english: The utilization of water quenched slag from ferromanganese blast furnace is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 深入地探討了錳鐵高爐水淬礦渣的利用。

sentences.english: The performance of the slag cement blended with desulphurization gypsum is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了脫硫石膏對礦渣水泥物理性能的影響。

sentences.english: The slag heaps hold massive dumps of crushed rock discarded after gold extraction.
sentences.chinese: 礦渣堆由金礦挖掘後遺留下來的大量碎石所組成。

sentences.english: Preparation of Glass-ceramics Using Pyrite Tailings;
sentences.chinese: 利用熔融法制備礦渣微晶玻璃。

sentences.english: The crack-resistant property of slag concretes are evaluated.
sentences.chinese: 還對礦渣砼的抗裂性進行了評估。

sentences.english: The impact on the pozzolanic effect by the fineness of superfine slag powder is changed with content.
sentences.chinese: 摻量不同，火山灰效應受礦渣微粉細度的影響也不同。

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
to eliminate/to sack/to remove from office
(of an official) corrupt and negligent of his duty
to recover (illegally obtained property)/to seize/to capture/to force sb to hand over sth/to levy
